name: tunnelforge-desktop
description: TunnelForge Desktop App - Cross-platform terminal sharing (Windows, Linux, macOS)
author: TunnelForge Team

scripts.build: bun run build:web && bun run tauri build
scripts.build:debug: bun run build:web && bun run tauri build --debug
scripts.build:windows: bun run build:web && bun run tauri build --target x86_64-pc-windows-msvc
scripts.build:linux: bun run build:web && bun run tauri build --target x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
scripts.build:macos: bun run build:web && bun run tauri build --target x86_64-apple-darwin
scripts.build:all: bun run build:web && bun run build:windows && bun run build:linux && bun run build:macos
scripts.clean: cargo clean && rm -rf dist node_modules && cd ../web && rm -rf native dist
scripts.setup:windows: bun run setup && rustup target add x86_64-pc-windows-msvc
scripts.setup:linux: bun run setup && rustup target add x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
scripts.setup:all: bun run setup && rustup target add x86_64-pc-windows-msvc x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu aarch64-pc-windows-msvc aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu
